name: Emoji Shoot
description:
Shoot the emoji to the line of emojis.
Three of the same color emojis will explode.
Clear the line before the first emoji of the line goes in to the hole.
Make combos and get SPECIAL items.

Emojis, so cute!

Features:
*Classical game mode
*Lots of cute emojis
*Unlimited time
*Play offline

Enjoy it!
